body_html: Could you make a smaller PR that only changes variable_scope first? I'd much rather do it in a 2-step way, as these changes can break things in a subtle way and it can be hard to figure out what broke what.
body_text: Could you make a smaller PR that only changes variable_scope first? I'd much rather do it in a 2-step way, as these changes can break things in a subtle way and it can be hard to figure out what broke what.
body: Could you make a smaller PR that only changes `variable_scope` first? I'd much rather do it in a 2-step way, as these changes can break things in a subtle way and it can be hard to figure out what broke what.
